author: Lindsay unfunk Freeman
comment: It's good, but doesn't look very nice on a round screen. Still, it's enough to keep me distracted at work.
title: Not bad

author: Riki Sutton
comment: It automatically combines numbers I didn't ask it to, doesn't have any animation, and one time I combined two 64 tiles and it made a 102 tile.  Nowhere near as good as the original game

reply.author: Skcript Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
reply.content: I recognize this bug, and will fix the issue right away for you! :)

title: Unplayable
